title: OnePlus could launch a Nord-branded smartwatch later this year
content:
OnePlus officially entered the smartwatch scene with the OnePlus Watch last year. The company’s first smartwatch offered a premium design and long-lasting battery but was held back by the buggy software and underwhelming feature set. While we haven’t heard anything about the OnePlus Watch successor yet, a fresh report reveals that the company is developing

The post OnePlus could launch a Nord-branded smartwatch later this year appeared first on xda-developers.
description: According to a new report, OnePlus is working on a new Nord smartwatch that will launch in Q3 2022. Read on to know more.
